page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW OF CHELFORD
page.content: Our area is a rural area close to Knutsford and Macclesfield. The main employment in the area is farming. The housing has increased in the last ten years with the building of a new housing estate. It also includes some of the older part of the village of Chelford. Also in the area are parts of Nether Alderley and Great Warford. Great Warford has a lot of land belonging to the David Lewis Epileptic Centre and the Mary Dendy Homes for people with mental illnesses. Chelford has a general market and a cattle market which serves the local farming community and a larger surrounding area. Everyone we spoke to enjoyed living in this area and thought it a beautiful place to live.
